root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix L330 Point & Shoot Camera (Black)
Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, I/O Terminal: Audio / Video (A/V) Output, Digital I/O (USB) DC Input Connector
Focus Area Selecton: Center, Face Detection, Digital Zoom Magnification: 35 mm (135) Equivalent 2340 mm, Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Pre-flashes
12 Elements in 9 Groups (1 ED Lens Element)
50 cm (1 ft, 8 inch) - Infinity (W), 1.5 m (5 ft) - Infinity (T)
Single (Default Setting), Continuous (the Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting is 1 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 4, BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16

Easy Auto, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Night Landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, Panorama Assist, Pet Portrait), Smart Portrait, Auto
Matrix, Center-weighted (Digital Zoom less than 2x), Spot (Digital Zoom 2x or more)

Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

One Touch HD 720p Movie Recording, Vibration Reduction: Lens Shift, Motion Blur Reduction (Still Picture), Tripod Socket: 1/4 (ISO 1222), Still Pictures: 370 Shots when Using Alkaline Batteries, 960 Shots when Using Lithium Batteries, 580 Shots when Using EN-MH2 Batteries, Electronically Controlled ND Filter (-3.3 AV), Range: F3.1 - F9.9 Aperture 2 Steps, Movie Recording (Actual Battery Life for Recording): 1 hr 40 min when Using Alkaline Batteries, 4 hr 40 min when Using Lithium Batteries 2 hr 50 min when Using EN-MH2 Batteries, Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 98% Horizontal and 98% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image)

Easy Auto, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Night Landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, Panorama Assist, Pet Portrait), Smart Portrait, Auto
File System: DCF, EXIF 2.3, DPOF Compliant
JPEG Movies: MOV (Video: H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC)
430 g (with Battery and SD Memory Card)
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.

This camera is handy and good for non professionals.Picture quality perfect.Zoom best.But this is battery consuming. I was using normal pencil batteries and while flash is on within three clicks battery is down.Without flash battery exhausted in 15 clicks.Hope there will be some solution to it.

Pros:Good zooming capabilities.Digital zoom is an added advantageExcellent image processingExcellent Auto mode which will help in detecting different scenes.20.2 Mega pixel at this price is good deal. Cons:AA batteries.Overall a good deal coz you will get a original charger + Pouch+8 GB memory card + two set of batteries.Total value for money.
performance of this cam is very nice.....but i suggest it only for beginners.Flipkart service is excellent, i got this product before the expected date
Good Product from the look of it. Haven't used much as of now, but from watever i have used, looks promising.Comes with all the necessary accessories.Good Buy for this price
This is nice experience with flipkart. The camera zoom is excellent. quality is also good. Thanks flipkart and WSretail to sale this amazing product.

Best camera price of Rs. 10,000.Really good, 400 mtr big zoom & clear picture quality.Exact colour.Excellent night photo without flash.Very easy to use & Nikon provide free rechargeable sale, free charger, free 8 GB memory card.Excellent service by Flipkart.

Good camera all possible accessories came like bag, memory card lens cover, warranty card.took few photos which are possibly best pics of mine,zooming capacity is still best 26x again flipkart packing proved it is best in india.Finally good one for this price

Best Purchase. Delivered within a single day and camera is awesome. Dont go for negative reviews. If you wana purchase any high budget DSLR, then you can try this camera first which comes with a great DSLR grip and in a great price and zoom is awsome
Excellent product & very much worth for the price. Its a mini DSLR camera that you get here for a much acceptable amount.

the item is very worth full to purchase in less price of money. n the features of camera n zooming quality were awesome. if found any other company camera to this product no company can beat this product. its really wow...!!!!
